text: | Consider the regular expression R = (a + b)* (aa + bb) (a + b)* Which one of the regular expressions given below defines the same language as defined by the regular expression R ? A. (a(ba)* + b(ab)*)(a + b)*â„¢ B. (a(ba)* + b(ab)*)*(a + b)* C. (a(ba)*(a + bb) + b(ab)*(b+ aa))(a + b)* D. (a(ba)*(a + bb) + b(ab)*(b + aa))(a + b)* gateit-2007 theory-of-computation regular-expression normal
